game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Explore the ancient temple and retrieve the legendary artifact.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple has been rediscovered, and rumors of a powerful artifact have drawn the attention of many adventurers. Brave the dangers within to claim the treasure.

tasks.objective: Enter the temple and reach the inner sanctum.
tasks.description: Make your way through the overgrown jungle and navigate the treacherous temple traps to reach the heart of the ancient structure.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the inner sanctum.
tasks.description: Solve the puzzles and defeat the powerful entity guarding the treasure to claim it as your own.
